oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: The New Digital Bleek and Lloyd
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: |han=kass'o (Klein Jantje) (VIII)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The rain's 'things' (or !khoa ka ||kerri-ssi !kau) of |han=kass'o's country have large bodies and dwell in water; some of them kill people when they bite them. 1) p.6074v: see The |khuken-|u |unu, 2) see also Remarks concerning copies of Bushman pictures nos. I-XXIV Collected By Mr H.C. Schunke, and deposited in the Grey Library, 3) This story is found in Book VIII-1.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: An account of the rain's things or !khoa ka ||kerri-ssi !kau
